text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Weeell, then! It's about time to head to training!

text_block_list.name: TV Host
text_block_list.text: "The series 'Honing Your Talent'… will provide you with plenty of useful information throughout the night!"

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oya!? Isn't this TV show the legendary series of must-see honors students!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: However… throughout the night. Right then, I'll just have to do training another ti… But……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: No, nonono! I'm brilliant! I can make up for lost practice in no time!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: This is the only time I can watch this show! Because I can never get it back…!
This is how Sakura Bakushin O got so caught up in her TV show that she neglected her training.
